search_results.title: Rational Anthem
search_results.snippet: Casey Thayer's Rational Anthem offers wry tribute to “the greatest country God could craft with the mules he had / on hand.”

search_results.title: Rational Anthem - Center for Literary Publishing
search_results.snippet: Casey Thayer's latest collection, Rational Anthem, is a meditation on American patriotism and the particular brand of masculinity that comes with it.

search_results.title: About Rational Anthem by Casey Thayer
search_results.snippet: "Casey Thayer's Rational Anthem tangles with the multi-fisted specter of masculinity, yet veers into tenderness and insight with a deftness that startles. It's ...
